Trade/Device Name(s): PocketChem EZ Meter Blood Glucose Monitoring System
PocketChem EZ Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PocketChem EZ Blood Glucose Monitoring System and accessories for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips and palms, for monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control in home (OTC) or clinical settings; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus or use on neonates.
